item.title: Jay Riordan Promo Mix feb 2012
item.description: Featuring lots of exclusive tracks!
item.dc:creator: jay riordan

item.title: Episode 5
item.description: some unreleased tracks remixe s bootlegs and forthcoming tracks, i just thought id put this together for practice leading up to the DXR Mixed Series as i will not be able to play some of these ones on it and probably never will play them other wise , get the track list from here http://www.mixcloud.com/jayriordan
item.dc:creator: jay riordan

item.title: Episode 4 ...2fm sessions
item.description: A collection of unreleased / my remixes + original / and tracks that i have signed to dublin xpress recordings enjoy! Track List 1.Jay Riordan - Numeric Tech Funk - unsigned 2.Niki Carrera-Different Colours (Jay Riordan Robot Funk Remake) - redrobot records uk 3.Flatpackjesus-Gruvme (Jay Riordan Robotfunk remake redrobot records - uk 4.Michaelike - Resist Jay Riordan Remix - label tbc 5.Cut Bit Moterz - Telepathy - J Eustace Remix - Dublinxpress recordings 6.Cut Bit Moterz - Telepathy original mix 7.Mike Doc - Night Moves ( Jay Riordan Rmx) -Dublinxpress recordings 8.Juma - Sidewinder (Original Mix) - Dublinxpress recordings 9.Produse - Primal 1 (E-Teb Mix) Dublinxpress recordings 10.Photosonic Orcestra - Synfony v (Michaelike Remix) Dublinxpress recordings 11.Cut Bit Moterz - Copy Catz Original -Dublinxpress recordings 12.The Bastard (A.K.A Jay Riordan) Some 1 else - RedBox records 13.Jay Riordan - Untamed - Dublinxpress recordings

A collection of unreleased / my remixes + original / and tracks that i have signed to dublin xpress recordings enjoy!
